 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָפַח‎</span>] **verb** ==breathe, blow== (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כור נפוח‎</span> [[Eccl.43.4|Eccl 43:4]] ***a furnace blown upon*** (heated hot); Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָפַח‎</span> ***id.***, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְפַח‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***napâ—u***</u></abbr>, ***inflame***, <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***nappa—u***</u></abbr>, ***smith*** [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 474</sup>; Arabic (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> and) <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***blow***; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> or <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>712</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָָֽפְחָה‎</span> [[Jer.15.9|Jer 15:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנָפַ֫חְתִּי‎</span> [[Hag.1.9|Hag 1:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנָפַחְתִּ֫י‎</span> [[Ezek.22.21|Ezek 22:21]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּפַּח‎</span> [[Gen.2.7|Gen 2:7]] ***Imperative*** feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּחִי‎</span> [[Ezek.37.9|Ezek 37:9]] ***Infinitive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(לָ)פַ֫חַת‎</span> [[Ezek.22.20|Ezek 22:20]] ***Perfect active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֹפֵחַ‎</span> [[Isa.54.16|Isa 54:16]] ***passive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָפוּחַ‎</span> [[Jer.1.13|Jer 1:13]]; [[Job.41.12|Job 41:12]] — ***breathe, blow***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּפַּח בְּאַפּוֺ נִשְׁמַת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַיִּים‎</span> [[Gen.2.7|Gen 2:7]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> also [[Ezek.37.9|Ezek 37:9]]; [[Isa.54.16|Isa 54:16]] and [[Hag.1.9|Hag 1:9]] ***blow*** into it (to scatter it); followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלֿ‎</span>: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָפַחַת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָלָיו אֵשׁ‎</span> [[Ezek.22.20|Ezek 22:20]] ***to blow fire upon it*** (ore, for melting), so figurative [[Ezek.22.21|Ezek 22:21]] ***and I will blow upon you with*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span>) ***the fire of my wrath***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַפְשָׁהּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[Jer.15.9|Jer 15:9]] ***she hath breathed out her life*** (of a mother, compare **Hiph\`il**); absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִיר נָפוּחַ‎</span> [[Jer.1.13|Jer 1:13]] ***a blown*** (i.e. well-heated, boiling) ***pot***, compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דּוּד נ‎</span> [[Job.41.12|Job 41:12]] (simile). **Pu\`al** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵשׁ לֹא נֻפָּ֑ח‎</span> [[Job.20.26|Job 20:26]] ***a fire not blown*** (by any human breath). So perhaps also [[Num.21.30|Num 21:30]] (reading <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַדנֻֿפַּח אֵשׁ וגו‎</span> ***until fire was blown*** [hot] as far as Medeba), compare [[BDB#Di|Di]]. **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶפֶשׁ בְּעָלֶיהָ חִפָּ֑חְתִּי‎</span> [[Job.31.39|Job 31:39]] (or if) ***the life of its*** (the land's) ***owners I have caused them to breathe out***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִפַּחְתֶּם אוֺתוֺ‎</span> [[Mal.1.13|Mal 1:13]] ***and ye have sniffed at it*** (in contempt).
